divs: sighting details last night 10\15\01 at around 9:10 pm there were astring of objects in loose formation moveing east to west across arkansasmissouri border looked like orange pinpoints or a little larger i could see themclearly as orbs . they were reflecting the same color as the town lights ithink. that is why they seemed to be orange. there were ten of them moving veryfast at high altitude. there was a plane going by just after the incident . theyhad to have seen them go underneath or above them. their pattern was loosemoving from arrow shaped to string of lights. the sky was clear and still.
trends: There have been 5 other sightings in Bentonville
